conversations.dialog: Have you met the fella yet?

responses: Well I'm glad someone likes him, that googly eyed lil jackrabbit needs a friend. Keeps thumping on the wrong foxholes asking for sugar.

choices.choice: No, I haven’t had the chance yet.
responses: Well good luck when you do, the dude will just look dead at you and it doesn't ever feel like he's even noticed you.
